product_entries.full_product_description: Cable Trays 17.1 | Ladder type GI cable tray (100mmx2mm, 3 Meter length) with minimum hot dip zinc coating 75 micron with accessories like coupler plates,bends, Stainless steels hardwares like nuts & bolts , bends, washers etc and as per IS & ES:8161. d. | 150mm Wide
